forecast.name: Today

forecast.name: Tonight

weather_report:
In Boston this morning, the sky greets all with a crisp clarity, tinged with the soft glow of dawn as the sun prepares its ascent. The air is brisk, pricking at the skin with an invigorating chill that beckons layers. Scattered clouds may dance playfully across the horizon, but the promise is clear: an exhilarating day lies ahead, with the heightened sun warming the earth and chasing away any lingering remnants of night’s frost. 

As the morning unfolds, the high temperature nudges towards a comfortable 33 degrees, a perfect setting for a stroll along the Charles or a leisurely visit to one of the city's many parks. A snug jacket coupled with a woolen scarf would serve one well against the playful west winds, which may stir the trees and send leaves swirling. As the light continues to shift towards afternoon, the day promises both vibrant sun and a gentle breeze, ideal for quiet contemplation with a cup of warm coffee or perhaps an engaging read at your favorite café. As evening descends, the air will cool again, beckoning you indoors, perhaps with the lingering warmth of the day's sun still captured in your thoughts.
